import { useContext } from "react"; import Button from "../Buttons/Button" import { CartContext } from '../context/CartContext'; const Item = ({id, name, price, imgSrc, quantity}) => { const {removeItem} = useContext(CartContext) return (

{name}

${price}

Cantidad: {quantity}

Subtotal: ${quantity*price}

) } export default Item
